title: Fix and standardize site branding logo and icon assets

requirements.summary: Ensure the user-provided logo PNG exists in frontend static assets at the exact path referenced by the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` exists in the built output and can be fetched directly from the deployed site at `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` (HTTP 200).
The image is a valid PNG and displays correctly in the browser (not broken/missing).

file_operations.description: Add the user-provided logo PNG as a static asset so it is served from `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` in production builds.

requirements.summary: Standardize header and footer branding to always use the user-provided logo and eliminate any remaining old-logo references.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeader.tsx` uses `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` for the branding image and it visibly renders on the Home, About, Solutions, and Contact pages.

`frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFooter.tsx` uses `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` for the branding image and it visibly renders on the Home, About, Solutions, and Contact pages.
No remaining references to `/assets/generated/linex-logo.dim_512x512.png` are used for the header/footer branding image in the codebase.

file_operations.description: Create a single source of truth for brand asset paths (including `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png`) and branding alt text to prevent regressions to the old logo.
Update header branding image usage to reference the centralized branding configuration and ensure it resolves to `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` (and not the old generated logo).
Update footer branding image usage to reference the centralized branding configuration and ensure it resolves to `/assets/generated/linex-logo-user.dim_512x512.png` (and not the old generated logo).

requirements.summary: Ensure all brand/SEO icon assets referenced by index.html exist as deployed static assets and load correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: `/assets/generated/favicon.dim_32x32.png` loads successfully on the deployed site.
`/assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png` loads successfully on the deployed site.
`/assets/generated/og-image.dim_1200x630.png` loads successfully on the deployed site.
All user-facing titles/descriptions/alt text related to branding remain in English.

file_operations.description: Add the generated favicon asset to the deployed static assets so it is available at `/assets/generated/favicon.dim_32x32.png`.
Add the generated Apple touch icon asset to the deployed static assets so it is available at `/assets/generated/apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png`.
Add the generated Open Graph image asset to the deployed static assets so it is available at `/assets/generated/og-image.dim_1200x630.png`.
Verify the favicon, apple-touch-icon, and og-image tags reference the correct `/assets/generated/...` paths and keep all branding-related metadata in English.
